Line1.EDC70: We have held out against the damned Wolves for three days. They’re more stubborn than we gave ‘em credit for, and we’re about out of water.
Line3.EDC70: Our brothers won’t be back for a fortnight, and without water or food we won’t survive waiting for ‘em.
Line5.EDC70: I told Zulak we should have rejoined the main caravan and now here we are, about to be another victory to grow the legend of the Iron Wolves.
